profile:
T.J. Fine Custom Upholstering Furniture offers custom designed sofas, sectionals, loveseats and chairs to furnish your home. We have a large selection of both fashionable and traditional fabrics to choose from.
We work with you to design, create custom made furniture or to repair old furniture. 
We specialize in these areas:
-Furniture Designers & Custom Builders
-Furniture Refinish & Repair 
and are the top Upholsterers in the GTA.

profile:
Alo Upholstery & Interiors specializes in custom made furniture and re-upholstery including working with genuine leather, custom headboards, refinishing and antique restoration. We also do window treatments plus installation. 

We carry a wide range of fabric samples from Robert Allen, Joanne Fabrics, Maxwell Fabrics, Kravets, Charlotte Fabrics and etc. in our showroom for furniture and Drapery. 

*Estimates are free!* 

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to see our latest projects.

profile:
Welcome to From Dark To Light Carpet & Upholstery Care. 

We are two friends reunited in Canada, and we decided to start our own cleaning business. 
Our service is combination of Eco-friendly products, knowledgeable and experience technicians, most updated equipment, strict procedures and love for what we do. 

Cleaning procedures are: vacuuming, pre spraying, agitation, hot water extraction and buffing. Disinfection and scotch guard protection are always an option. 
Donâ€™t let your carpet or upholstery to be a breeding ground for germs and bacteria or allergens. Clean carpets and upholstery make your environment healthier.  

When it comes to pet enzyme decontamination we are experts. We can solve even the most severe pet urine accidents.  

We take a pride in the work we do, and we guarantee you'll love the results of our carpet and upholstery cleaning service!

Our Business Hours: 8:00 am until 9:00 pm, 7 days a week 

Available for Emergency stains and carpet cleaning as well.

*** Covid 19 Update: We will be wearing PPE and practicing social distancing while attending the appointments ***

profile:
FINE DESIGN Interiors has been in business for 17 years and has over 25 years experience in the furniture business. We specialize in custom made furniture, custom headboards and re-upholstery, sofa repair and wood refinishing. All our work is tailored by professionals. Our custom made sofas can be tailored to any size and any color combinations. FINE DESIGN Interiors can provide you with a free quote for your upholstery needs. Just send us a picture, dimension and type of fabric you like. 

You may have seen our work at the ROYAL YORK HOTEL, Windsor Arms and Chateau Laurier.

profile:
Prestige Decor Window Treatments & Upholstery specializes in window treatments, drapery fabrics, upholstery fabrics and furniture upholstery services. With over 200,000 upholstery and drapery fabrics to choose from, our interior designers can help you design the perfect window treatments and matching upholstery for your residential or commercial projects. Our specialty is custom drapery, blind, window shutters and window shades. We design window coverings that fit perfectly in your unique living space, and our prices are hard to beat by our competitors in the Greater Toronto Area.

Our window treatment and furniture upholstery consultants have over 10 years of experience and are experts in finding the perfect fabrics and style for your individual applications. Come to our showroom in Mississauga to view beautiful window treatments and furniture reupholstery. 

***

Call us today to book a free 30 minute in-store consultation. Our window covering and upholstery interior designers will sit with you and show you exactly what you are looking for.
